data.prayer: Father, encourage the 15,442 believers in Tbong Khmum to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tbong Khmum, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Tbong Khmum. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Tbong Khmum, Cambodia.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Tbong Khmum, Cambodia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Han Chinese, Cantonese people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Han Chinese, Cantonese people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Han Chinese, Cantonese people is yours.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Tbong Khmum access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, help the 15,442 believers in Tbong Khmum to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Tbong Khmum, Cambodia to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

location.name: Tbong Khmum
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Teochew, Burmese, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Kraol, Thai
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Han Chinese, Teochew (183,000), Burmese (5,200), Han Chinese, Mandarin (468,000), Kraol (5,000), Thai (3,300)
